abstract: Can Facebook lure the hottest talent with the prospective of becoming millionaires with stock options? Some people suggest the $15 billion valuation of the company will make it harder to get rich, really rich, there.
snippet: Can Facebook lure the hottest talent with the prospective of becoming millionaires with stock options? Some people suggest the $15 billion valuation of the company will make it harder to get rich, really rich, there.
lead_paragraph: UPDATE: This post has been updated to incorporate comments from Jim Breyer and other minor changes.
